{
  "name": "hypercode",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "HyperCode: Programming Language for All Minds - Built for neurodivergent thinkers, powered by AI, inspired by forgotten genius",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=16.0.0",
    "npm": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc",
    "dev": "tsc --watch",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.ts\"",
    "clean": "rm -rf dist coverage",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build && npm run test",
    "docs": "typedoc --out docs/api src",
    "start": "node dist/index.js"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "programming-language",
    "neurodivergent",
    "accessibility",
    "ai",
    "esoteric",
    "dsl",
    "dyslexia-friendly",
    "adhd-friendly",
    "autism-friendly",
    "inclusive-tech"
  ],
  "author": "HyperCode Labs",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/HyperCode-Labs/HyperCode#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.0",
    "@types/node": "^20.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.40.0",
    "jest": "^29.5.0",
    "prettier": "^3.0.0",
    "ts-jest": "^29.1.0",
    "typescript": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "optionalDependencies": {},
  "jest": {
    "preset": "ts-jest",
    "testEnvironment": "node",
    "roots": [
      "<rootDir>/src"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "**/__tests__/**/*.ts",
      "**/?(*.)+(spec|test).ts"
    ],
    "collectCoverageFrom": [
      "src/**/*.ts",
      "!src/**/*.d.ts",
      "!src/**/index.ts"
    ],
    "coverageThreshold": {
      "global": {
        "branches": 80,
        "functions": 80,
        "lines": 80,
        "statements": 80
      }
    }
  },
  "prettier": {
    "semi": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "singleQuote": true,
    "printWidth": 100,
    "tabWidth": 2
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "parser": "@typescript-eslint/parser",
    "extends": [
      "eslint:recommended",
      "plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended"
    ],
    "rules": {
      "@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars": "warn",
      "@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-types": "warn"
    }
  }
}
